text: I'd create a repeater field in a module and then use that to create content boxes for your 'cards' - then you can link through to the pages required. If you need to to be dynamically updated then perhaps HubDB could work - depending on the target content.

I'm wanting to create 3 columns that are totally flush (no margins or padding). The bootstrap row-fluid class doesn't allow this. Is there a way to add an ID to a section so that it's contents can be styled accordingly? Otherwise it looks like I need to create my own custom module. That would be a shame as I kinda feel this should be easily doable just by changing column padding and margins.
As an N=1, I was in a similar situation and just decided to go build my own custom theme because I couldn't figure out how to do it via normal design manager tools.
